mapper.select: select auction_no as auctionNo, auction_start as auctionStart, auction_end as auctionEnd, auction_product as auctionProudct, auction_Price as auctionPrice, auction_Count1 as auctionCount1, farm_No as farmNo, auction_Form_No as auctionFormNo, farm_No2 as farmNo2, farm_No3 as farmNo3, auction_Count2 as auctionCount2, auction_Count3 as auctionCount3, auction_EndYN as auctionEndYN from auction where auction_form_no=1 and to_date(auction_end)=to_date(sysdate)
